title: Complete project
description: Draft and submit the proposal for the upcoming project.

title: Weekly team meeting
description: Discuss updates and assign next steps for the team.

title: Prepare presentation slides
description: Create slides for the client presentation next week.

title: Submit expense reports
description: Compile and submit expense reports for the month.

title: Code review
description: Review code submissions from the development team.

title: Conduct user interviews
description: Interview users to gather feedback on the new feature.

title: Plan team-building activity
description: Organize a team-building event to improve collaboration and morale.
